org.dgfoundation.amp.ar

Class ReportContextData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.ReportContextData

  • public class ReportContextData
extends java.lang.Object
    holds all the information (AmpReports instance + extra information) needed to generate and render a report
    extra information == anything which is not not in an AmpReports instance or accessible through 1:1 relationships with one
    the class is not synchronized because:
    the "global" data it operates one is split across sessions
    the only destructive operation is creating a RCD, and this operation happens in very few places of code which do not happen at the same time

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      the request attribute name of reportId to fetch from if request.ampReportId is missing (used for non-single-report pages, like "View Workspace")

      static java.lang.String REPORT_ID_CURRENT_WORKSPACE
      these ID's below will get pushed into URL's, so make them ASCII strings without separators!

      static java.lang.String REPORT_ID_REPORT_WIZARD 
      static java.lang.String REPORT_ID_WORKSPACE_EDITOR

      for debugging purposes mainly

      • loadOrCreateFilter

        public AmpARFilter loadOrCreateFilter(boolean initFromDB,
                                      FilterDataSetInterface source)
        returns a guaranteed non-null filter connected to a source. If none exists, creates one filled with defaults. Puts the created/retrieved filter in RCD.filter
        Parameters:
        initFromDB - if true, then tries to read filter data from source and reverts to defaults if not possible. if false, gets preexisting filter or creates none if nonexisting
        source - - the source to be used when initFromDB=true. Ignored when initFromDB=false
        Returns:

      • initFilters

        inits filters off a FilterDataSetInterface source or keeps current data TODO: implement copy instead of double-load
        Parameters:

        protected void resetCurrency(AmpARFilter filter)
        resets the currency of a filter to the default one - the default one being specified off AmpARFilter.getDefaultCurrency()
        if filter is null OR this filter has been touched by applying filters / settings, nothing is done (NPE is not thrown)
        Parameters:

        public static ReportContextData getFromRequest(boolean createIfNotExists)

      • reportIsLoaded

        public static boolean reportIsLoaded(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        returns true iff: 1. a reportContextId is defined 2. there is a report loaded in mem for it
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:

      • createWithId

        public static ReportContextData createWithId(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                             java.lang.String id,
                                             boolean overwriteIfExists)
        creates a ReportContextData with a given id, replacing the already-existing one with the same id
        Parameters:
        session - - the session where to attach this ReportContextData
        id - - the newly-created ReportContextData id
        overwriteIfExists - if true, any preexisting RCD with the same id will be deleted, if false - null will be returned
        Returns:
        newly created RCD instance or null if an another one with the same id exists and overwriteIfExists = true

      • createWithId

        public static ReportContextData createWithId(java.lang.String id,
                                             boolean overwriteIfExists)
        see createWithId(HttpSession, String, boolean)'s description and limitations
        Parameters:
        id -
        overwriteIfExists -
        Returns:

      • cleanContextData

        public static void cleanContextData()
        creates a fresh ReportContextData for the current reportId, as per getFromRequest() rules. Overwrites any preexisting data

      • cleanCurrentReportCaches

        public static boolean cleanCurrentReportCaches()
        calls cleanReportCaches() on current report will throw exception if no current id exists
        Returns:
        true if managed to clean (e.g. reportContextId exists)

      • clearSession

        public static void clearSession()
        clears the SESSION of any ReportContextData contained in it.

        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
